mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM business_day b WHERE b.business_date > (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM business_day WHERE is_current_business_day = 'TRUE') AND b.status = 'SCHEDULED' ORDER BY b.business_date ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
